titles.title: All creatures of our God and King

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All creatures of our God and King
Lift up your voice and with us sing
Oh, praise Him
Alleluia

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou burning sun with golden beam
Thou silver moon with softer gleam
Oh, praise Him
Oh, praise Him
Alleluia
Alleluia
Alleluia

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou rushing wind that art so strong
Ye clouds that sail in heav'n along
Oh, praise Him
Alleluia

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thou rising moon in praise rejoice
Ye lights of evening find a voice
Oh, praise Him
Oh, praise Him
Alleluia
Alleluia
Alleluia

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let all things their creator bless
And worship Him in humbleness
Oh, praise Him
Alleluia

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Praise, praise the Father praise the Son
And praise the Spirit three in one
Oh, praise Him
Oh, praise Him
Alleluia
Alleluia
Alleluia

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Praise, praise the Father praise the Son
And praise the Spirit three in one
Oh, praise Him
Oh, praise Him
Alleluia
Alleluia
Alleluia
